divs: Sighting Detailsi was working as a mover with my dad and his co-workers. we were relocating a saturn car dealer's offices. we had finished loading a truck, the truck and most of the crew took off to the new building for drop off unloading. Myself and another worker were left behind to watch over the boxes that were left behind. we were sitting down taking a break, the workers from the dealership then came out to have a cigarrate (about 4 people) when i one of them ;an asian lady, say : oh my god look! so i looked up at the sky and there it was. an enormous flying disc hovering behind a two cypress trees. the disc after hovering for about 10 seconds, turned sideways, now looking like a circle rather than a disc. the disc then decended behind the cypress trees. and a split second later a bright golden sphere apeared from the sky at light speed and flew around the sky looking for the flying saucer . the sphere then ascended and disapeared in the sky. by that time we were all engaged in a conversation. we were all amazed . but that incident left me thinking that perhaps these ufo's are at odds with eachother. like at war or something. i mean why would one hide from the other?
Summary: silver metalic flying disc hiding from a bright golden sphere
